docs.lead_paragraph: JUSTICE HENRY BISCHOFF of the Supreme Court was a widower for several years. Recently he announced his forthcoming marriage to Mrs. Collamore, an old friend of his family. His daughter, who is married, asked him how she should in future address her stepmother.
